item.title: [REVIEW] Audio Relay - Never buy a bluetooth speaker again!
item.description: Want a quick solution for an external speaker? Got an Android Phone Lying Around? Use the Audio Relay app to turn that phone into a boosted speaker!

item.title: CoinEX: my Personal Preference for Non-KYC Centralized Exchange

item.title: Properly install Kali Apps in Linux Mint, Ubuntu, and Debian Based Distributions!

item.title: Create a Portable Linux with USB Flash Drive [Windows]
item.description: Don't want to go wild and dual boot? Or want your workspace to fit in your pocket? Live Persistence Linux is just the right choice for you!

item.title: How Dictionary based Bruteforce Attacks can be more optimized with CUPP
item.description: CUPP is an unique password profiling technique where you can generate a dictionary word list curated for your target!
